entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Terrace Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:52 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -5.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Terrace Bay 12:00 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023
Temperature: -5.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.7 kPa falling
Humidity: 87 %
Wind Chill: -11
Dewpoint: -7.3°C
Wind: WSW 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 14 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Light snow ending in the morning then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023
